description:
Secure and lightweight, this hitch-mount bike rack holds 2 bikes with ample space in between for frame protection and easy loading. It can be installed tool-free and folds out of the way (when unloaded) for unobstructed access to a rear hatch.

  • Lightweight aluminum construction for easy installation, removal and handling
  • Generous 7-inch spacing between bikes
  • Integrated anti-sway straps prevent bike to bike contact and can be removed when not needed
  • Rack can be tilted down (when unloaded) to allow access to rear hatch
  • Complete bike security with integrated cable lock
  • Bikes attach securely via ratchet strap
  • Bike arms fold down when not in use
  • Compact cradle design accommodates a wide variety of bike sizes/frame styles
  • Fast, tool-free installation
  • Fits 1.25-inch and 2-inch hitches
name: Thule Helium Pro 2 Bike Rack
